TEXT.TITLE: CORRECTED-LILLY INDUSTRIAL COATINGS INC <LICIA>
TEXT.BODY: 1st qtr Feb 28 end Shr 18 cts vs 13 cts Net 1,541,000 vs 1,122,000 Sales 39.7 mln vs 33.5 mln Avg shrs 8,517,000 vs 8,441,000 NOTE: Share adjusted for five pct stock dividend in August 1986. Company corrects current year sales. Reuter
